scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build-essential
scripts.build-essential: npm run build-client && npm run build-server && npm run copy-assets
scripts.copy-assets: node -e "const fs=require('fs'); fs.mkdirSync('public/styles', {recursive:true}); fs.copyFileSync('src/styles/main.css', 'public/styles/main.css'); try { fs.copyFileSync('src/index.html', 'public/index.html'); } catch(e) { console.log('Note: index.html not found in src/'); } console.log('âœ… Assets copied');"
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run watch-client" "npm run watch-server" "npm run serve"
scripts.clean: node -e "const fs=require('fs'); ['dist','public'].forEach(d => { try { fs.rmSync(d, {recursive:true, force:true}); } catch(e) {} });"
scripts.vercel-build: npm run build-essential && npm run copy-assets
